segments.text: it's a lovely day , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah , and most excitingly , I met the girl living under me today . She's really nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , and most importantly , she's single ! Man , I could tell from the moment I saw her , she's the girl of my dreams !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: so I take it you two are hitting it off ? I know it's very convenient to be in a relationship with your neighbor , but what if you break up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I am not really worried about that . I don't wanna lose before even starting . Besides I think the other two American guys have also fallen for her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sounds like you've got some competition . You made a move already ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: not yet . But I am thinking of inviting her to dinner sometime . I know some good restaurants nearby .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's nice . Having been here a little while surely gives you the advantage , eh ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: you bet . Now that you mentioned it , I think I'll call her now and see if she is available tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
